text: “Lowo mogoyo tongʼ gi Juda chakre wuok chiengʼ nyaka podho chiengʼ ema nobed migawo mowinjore ichiw kaka mich makende. Lachne nobed kilomita apar gariyo gi nus, to borne koa yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka yo podho chiengʼ, nobed maromre gi mano mipogone dhoot ka dhoot. E dier lowono tir e kama nogerie kama ler mar lemo.
